name: Faultline Farm 🐷
description:
This is our entry for the Ludum Dare 49 game jam. The theme of this jam was "unstable", and so we set out creating a game set in a stable.

Terrible puns aside, gameplay occurs during an earthquake. Players must pick up and set their farm animals back upright in order to score points, with the ultimate goal of stabilising their farm. 🐷

Due to work commitments, neither of us were able to really utilise the third day of the jam, so the game has actually been created over two days instead of three.
